name: 10.000 Meters Deep
description:
10,000 Meters Deep is a 2d Action Adventure and Resource Management game where you collect resources to upgrade your submarine in order to make it to the bottom of the Ocean. You play as a diver working for NaMSA, a US agency responsible for partaking in the ocean race in the cold war. 

You are tasked with reaching the bottom of the Ocean before the USSR forces do. However, the head researcher, received intel that the USSR were about to reach the bottom within 14 days.

Your orders are to reach the bottom ASAP. You must traverse the depths and fend off vicious creatures of the deep before the deadline. Will you be able to make it in time?

10,000 Meters Deep was developed by 'ManaDesigner?', a team of passionate student developers from UOW KDU. The team consists of:

  • Valis Teoh
    Lead Artist /Designer
  • Muhammad Arif Imran Bin Mohd Iskandar
    Lead Programmer
  • Jimmy Wong Jian How
    Lead Designer/ UI Artist
  • Ainun Nawwarah
    Programmer
  • Thrishneshvarr Nageen Anantharajan
    Programmer
  • Gary Chu Jian Yoong 
    Programmer
  • Ng Wei Yuen 
    AI and Sound Programmer

Install Instructions: 

1. Unzip the downloaded file.
2. Run "10,000 meters below.exe" to start the game.
3. Enjoy!
